title: Loot skin disappears
body: I rerolled 3 legendary skin shards and got 100 orange essence and a permanent Elementalist Lux skin. I see the 100 organge essence but the Lux skin disappears, the truth is I don't get any skins at all. Can someone explain this to me please?

replies.body:
Any permanent skin shards are automatically unlocked for your account, so they won't show up in your Hextech loot unless it was a permanent shard for content you already own. That was a pretty good reroll btw, Elementalist Lux is dope af. ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions.
